Catalano.Imaging.Tools

Class ImageMoments

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Tools.ImageMoments

  • public final class ImageMoments
extends java.lang.Object
    Image Moments. Moment invariants are properties of connected regions in binary images that are invariant to translation, rotation and scale. They are useful because they define a simply calculated set of region properties that can be used for shape classification and part recognition.
    See Also:
    HuMoments, ZernikeMoments
